name: Revenge of The AESTAX
description:
CONTROLS: WASD or Arrow keys for movement, SPACE for shooting. Use mouse to navigate menu. 

Browser version needs to be fullscreen to work.(double click bottom right) YouTube link doesn't work in browser version. 

Free download available below for executable. 

This is a short sci-fi game inspired heavily by Starfox. I went for polish over content... I most likely won't be updating this game, but if you have feedback give it to me as I can apply things learned for my future games. 

Follow my game dev journey: 

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTF55vLsfcuI2epJShoZa0Q?sub_confirmation=1

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheJustinSix

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheJustinSix/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thejustinsix/

I made this game as part of "Complete C# Unity Developer 3D: Learn to Code Making Games" taught by Ben Tristem & Rick Davidson. I'm just trying to improve my skills with unity and C#.
